long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
# InterviewHacker AI - Master Interviews with Your AI Companion

Transform your interview performance with InterviewHacker AI, the ultimate Chrome extension that brings professional AI interview coaching to your browser. From entry-level positions to executive roles, our intelligent assistant helps you prepare, practice, and excel in any interview scenario.

## Powerful Features
- Instant AI Mock Interviews: Practice with industry-specific questions
- Real-time Interview Assistant: Get live suggestions during actual interviews
- Smart Meeting Summarizer: Convert long meetings into actionable insights
- Advanced Analytics: Track your progress with detailed performance metrics
- Multi-industry Support: Tailored for tech, finance, healthcare, and more
- Screen Analysis Tools: Perfect your body language and presentation

## Professional Benefits
- Increase Interview Success: Users report 40% higher job offer rates
- Industry-specific Preparation: Customized for your career path
- Time-efficient Learning: Practice anytime, anywhere
- Comprehensive Feedback: Get detailed insights on your responses
- Confidence Building: Master tough questions through repeated practice

## Technical Highlights
- Lightweight & Fast: <2MB extension size
- Privacy-focused: Bank-level encryption
- Flexible Interface: Resizable popup window
- Cross-platform Sync: Access your progress across devices
- Offline Support: Core features available without internet

## Plans & Pricing
- Free Plan: 7 AI responses/25 minutes
- Pro Plans: Starting at $9.99/month
- Enterprise: Custom solutions available
- No credit card required to start

Join 10,000+ professionals who trust InterviewHacker AI for their career advancement. Install now and experience the future of interview preparation.
